mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(l.PRICE), 0) FROM LECTURE l JOIN PAYMENT_DETAIL2 pd2 ON l.LECT_ID = pd2.LECT_ID JOIN PAYMENT p ON pd2.PAYREC_ID = p.PAYREC_ID WHERE l.INST_ID = #{instId} AND p.STATE = '1' AND TO_CHAR(p.TIME, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT l.LECT_ID AS lectId, l.NAME AS lectName, l.INST_ID AS instId, '/common/images/lecture_thumb_njwVersion/' || l.THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail, TO_CHAR(l.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS openDate, l.USERCOUNT AS userCount,
COUNT(CASE WHEN p.STATE = '1' THEN 1 END) AS salesCount,
NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN p.STATE = '1' THEN l.PRICE ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalPrice
FROM LECTURE l LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_DETAIL2 pd2 ON l.LECT_ID = pd2.LECT_ID LEFT JOIN PAYMENT p ON pd2.PAYREC_ID = p.PAYREC_ID WHERE l.INST_ID = #{instId} GROUP BY l.LECT_ID, l.NAME, l.INST_ID, l.THUMBNAIL, l.REGDATE, l.USERCOUNT ORDER BY l.REGDATE DESC
